Package market

Class Market

java.lang.Object
market.Market
public class Market extends Object
This class implements the Market where items and athletes can be sold and purchased

    • purchaseItem

      public boolean purchaseItem(Item purchasedItem)
      trys to subtract cost of item from team balance if sufficient funds, adds item to inventory then removes item from purchasable items else produces InsuffientBalanceError
      Parameters:
      purchasedItem - the item that is being purchased
      Returns:
      a boolean based on whether the item was successfully bought

    • purchaseAthlete

      public boolean purchaseAthlete(Athlete purchasedAthlete)
      trys to subtract cost of athlete from team balance if sufficient funds, adds athlete to team then removes athlete from purchasableAthletes else produces InsufficientBalanceError
      Parameters:
      purchasedAthlete - the athlete to be purchased
      Returns:
      a boolean based on whether the athlete was successfully bought
